TerrainBase

Class DensityVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PVector
      • TerrainBase.DensityVertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DensityVertex>

    public class DensityVertex
extends processing.core.PVector
implements java.lang.Comparable<DensityVertex>
    Extension of Processing's native PVector class for use as a vertex including an evaluation of the surface density at this point
    Version:
    1.00
    Author:
    Phil Larby
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
